title: (2014) Gemma Hayes - Bones + Longing [FLAC,Tracks] {100.XY}
description:
(2014) Gemma Hayes - Bones + Longing


Wikipedia:
Work on Bones+Longing began as far back as June 2012, when Hayes confirmed she began working on some new material.[10] Hayes had planned to move back to Los Angeles to work on the album, but later decided against this decision and continued to reside in Dublin.
On 9 August 2012, Hayes announced through an e-mail to fans she continued to produce some new music and also confirmed she had begun a side-project with long-term producer David Odlum. Hayes also confirmed the future release of a live limited edition vinyl (due for 2013), it was later released in spring 2014 as Night & Day. By late 2012, Hayes confirmed a short tour of both Ireland and the UK which commenced in early October 2012.
By April 22, 2013 Hayes announced a new batch of songs had been written and demos where being put down in the studio and she was heading to France to begin recording her fifth studio album (later titled Bones+Longing). During July 2013, Hayes returned to Ireland to tour as part of A Woman's Heart.
In August 16, 2013 Hayes launched her Pledge Music campaign where fans and pledges could support the album's production and release
During the early stages of the album's production Hayes became pregnant and production finished in late December and recommenced again in mid-February due to the birth of her baby. On 10 April 2014, Hayes revealed the titles of three new songs 'To Be Your Honey' (a preview of which was made available on her website), 'Palomino' and 'Making My Way Back'. Hayes later confirmed mixing and mastering took place in France the next month[18] In April 2014, Hayes performed a number of UK gigs[19][20] prior to the release of the fifth studio album. These gigs were part of her Pledge Music campaign. On June 16, 2014, Hayes confirmed the album has been completed.
